metadata.title: CVE-2022-3812 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Axiomatic Bento4. It has been rated asproblematic. Affected by this issue is the functionAP4_ContainerAtom::AP4_ContainerAtom of the component mp4encrypt. Themanipulation leads to memory leak. The attack may be launched remotely. Theexploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. VDB-212678 is theidentifier assigned to this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
